pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Salvoes fire multiple shots in a line at once, dealing 1 damage to each targeted grid. They always fire perpendicular to the direction your controller faces in (left to right, never up/down). Each salvo has one stat: Length. The length determines how many tiles are targeted by the ability. When selecting the deployment tile, be aware that this length is centered around

that tile. This means that if you select a tile too close to the edge of the board, the ability may target less tiles than its length indicates.$(br2)$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Salvoes can be useful for scouting early on.$(li)When a salvo hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield regardless of how much of the salvo hits the shield.
